mapper.select: select t1.*, (select t2.name from sys_org t2 where t2.id = t1.org_id) orgName from sys_user t1 where t1.id = #{id} and t1.deleted = 0
SELECT data_project_id FROM data_project_user_rel dpur INNER JOIN data_project dp ON dpur.data_project_id=dp.id WHERE user_id=#{userId} AND dp.status=1
